description: All stats relevant for an application built on top of the hypercore stack, including hypercore, hyperswarm, hyperdht, udx

panels.description: The number of times Node.js restarted.
panels.title: Node.js Restarts

targets.expr: hypercore_total_wire_sync_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_request_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_cancel_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_data_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_want_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_bitfield_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_range_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_extension_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}

rate(hypercore_total_wire_sync_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_request_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_cancel_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_data_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_want_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_bitfield_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_range_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_extension_received{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval])

hypercore_total_wire_sync_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_request_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_cancel_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_data_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_want_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_bitfield_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_range_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"} + hypercore_total_wire_extension_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}

rate(hypercore_total_wire_sync_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_request_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_cancel_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_data_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_want_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_bitfield_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_range_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval]) + rate(hypercore_total_wire_extension_transmitted{service="$service", instance="$instance"}[$interval])

title: Hypercore / Hyperswarm
